item.title: Justin Bieber assume homossexualidade e cancela shows no Brasil - Manu Gavassi - CAPRICHO
item.description: Justin Bieber assume homossexualidade cancela shows no Brasil http://t.co/BgGIC6s
item.content:encoded: Justin Bieber assume homossexualidade cancela shows no Brasil http://t.co/BgGIC6s É isso mesmo, meninas. O astro pop assumiu nesse sábado (03/09), durante uma coletiva de imprensa realizada em New York, a sua homossexualidade. “Não foi uma decisão fácil. Passei por um longo processo de auto aceitação envolvendo psicólogos e amigos, e sem eles, eu provavelmente não teria forças para encarar a verdade.” – Diz Justin. “Sempre procurei ser sincero com meus fãs, sou uma pessoa muito verdadeira. Dei um passo muito importante, embora saiba que sofrerei preconceito, infelizmente”. Com lágrimas nos olhos, Justin deixou a coletiva rapidamente, escoltado por vários seguranças. Não posou para fotos e nem mesmo respondeu aos jornalistas eufóricos que estavam ali Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: abril.com.br

item.title: Mi horizonte es mi provincia · ELPAÍS.com
item.description: Mi horizonte es mi provincia http://t.co/UwSswxl
item.content:encoded: Mi horizonte es mi provincia http://t.co/UwSswxl A buena parte de los españoles les cuesta hacer las maletas para emprender viaje. Las razones son de distinto rango, desde el bolsillo poco boyante hasta la falta de interés por conocer otras tierras. Sin embargo, existe un amplio grupo de irreductibles: el 20% de la población realiza casi el 80% de las escapadas de ocio. Link - Trackbacks

item.content:encoded: Ah, the joys of online dating: http://t.co/eAeXkkR A woman meets a man on Facebook. In the middle of the date, the man decides he will rob an off-track betting facility. item.content:encoded: Wilco to Stream New Album The Whole Love Tomorrow, for 24 Hours http://t.co/E7jvYCL On September 27, Wilco will release their latest full-length adventure, The Whole Love, on their own, newly launched label dBpm. And tomorrow, starting at 12pm Central Time, as "a reward for your labors, our labors, and those of our forefathers/mothers," (according to their newsletter), the band will stream the album in its entirety for 24 hours at their webpage, Wilcoworld.net. item.title: The Tragic Triumph Of The MBAs | TechCrunch
item.description: The Tragic Triumph Of The MBAs http://t.co/akszfyE by @rezendi
item.content:encoded: The Tragic Triumph Of The MBAs http://t.co/akszfyE by @rezendi “We’ve seen Mubarak fall,” said Salesforce’s Marc Benioff of the corporate need to focus on social networks at the recent Dreamforce conference. “We’ve seen Khadafy fall. When will the first CEO fall for the same reason?” What a fantastic comparison! Because, as we all know, dictators who brutalize, torture, and murder thousands of their own people over a period of decades are just like CEOs who miss quarterly profit targets. Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: techcrunch.com

item.title: Caterina.net» Blog Archive » Make things
item.description: Make things. http://t.co/FgNVFaT
item.content:encoded: Make things. http://t.co/FgNVFaT Anil and I have had a few conversations lately about building cool stuff for the internet, the Golden Age of the independent web, and how it’s increasingly hard to filter out industry noise. He posted a quote from Dave Winer and it reminded me of our “About” page for Ludicorp, where we outlined our corporate philosophy, which is akin to avoiding a tour of gas stations. I have a quote behind my desk from Freeman Dyson that I see every day: “There is a great satisfaction in building good tools for other people to use.” Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: caterina.net

item.title: Amazon’s 7-inch Kindle tablet set for November at $250 | VentureBeat
item.description: Amazon’s 7-inch Kindle tablet set for November at $250 http://ow.ly/6kpim by @devindra
item.content:encoded: Amazon’s 7-inch Kindle tablet set for November at $250 http://ow.ly/6kpim by @devindra Amazon's long-rumored tablet, dubbed simply the Kindle, is "very real" and headed your way this November for $250, reports TechCrunch's MG Siegler. After about an hour of hands-on time with the tablet, Siegler seems confident that it will be a hot item this holiday season. Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: venturebeat.com

item.title: Tom Watson: The End of WikiLeaks
item.description: The End of WikiLeaks http://t.co/iEw4CUy
item.content:encoded: The End of WikiLeaks http://t.co/iEw4CUy Last fall when the news broke that WikiLeaks was in possession of a quarter million U.S. diplomatic cables, I wrote that the putative pro-transparency organization was in fact a detriment to a serious movement aimed at more openness in government.... Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: tomwatson.typepad.com
